onyomiExamples.meaning: summer greeting card, inquiry after someone's health in the hot season
late summer heat, lingering summer heat
escaping the summer heat, going somewhere cooler during the summer, summering

kunyomiExamples.meaning: hot, warm, sultry, heated, passionate, impassioned, burning (desire, etc.), on everybody's mind, on the radar, du jour, interested (gaze, etc.)
heat of the day, hottest part of the day
